articles.title: First Volkswagen Golf GTI Imagined as Modern "Rabbit" Hot Hatch Tribute - autoevolution
articles.description: The Golf GTI is a car that, for over 40 years, has defined Volkswagen. It's not the fastest, cheapest, or most exciting hot hatch. Yet the branding is so strong that they're trying to force it onto their EVs, which is ironic when you think about it.
